speaker: Interviewer
content: Tell me about your experience with the project.

speaker: Candidate
content: Sure. I led a team of five engineers building a real-time data pipeline.

speaker: Candidate
content: We used Kafka for event streaming and PostgreSQL for storage.

speaker: Candidate
content: Handling backpressure during peak traffic was tricky. We had to implement circuit breakers.

speaker: Candidate
content: We added adaptive rate limiting and a dead letter queue for failed messages.

speaker: Interviewer
content: Impressive. What would you do differently?

speaker: Candidate
content: I would invest more in observability from the start. We added monitoring too late.
